text:
Question 61) The First Gulf War, genuinely supported by the United Nations and the International Community, as well as the immediate reaction to September eleven, demonstrated the strength of the United States in the post-Soviet era.
HOBSBAWM, E. globalization, democracy and terrorism. Sao Paulo: Cia. das Letras, 2007.
An aspect that explains the strength of the United States, pointed out by the text, resides in (a)
A) Power of its military bases spread around the world.
B) Geopolitical alignment of Russia compared to the US.
C) Territorial expansion policy exercised on Cuba.
D) Strategic alliance with oil producing countries, such as Kuwait and Iran.
E) Incorporation of China into the organization of the North Atlantic Treaty (NATO).
